name: iXledger
description: iXledger is a groundbreaking platform for insurance utilising blockchain. iXledger is founded in London 2017, through encouragement of clients interested in efficiencies enabled through innovative technology. Our aim is to create an alternative insurance platform. The architecture utilises a cutting edge stack consisting of React, NodeJS, Ethereum and OrientDB. Blockchain Insurance Getting insurance for your blockchain business presents various challenges: where to start, how to find the right specialist insurers, and how to ensure you have the right cover. By sourcing your insurance via iXledger you can: Manage the risks your business faces Increase the legitimacy of your venture Show potential investors and other interested third parties your smart insurance contract on the Ethereum
